<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Opportunistic Grapple](/Feats.aspx?ID=1918) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=52)

**Prerequisites**
[Bounty Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1914)

**Trigger**
Your prey critically fails on a melee Strike's attack roll against you.

**Requirements**
Your prey is within your reach, you have at least one free hand, and your target is no more than one size larger than you.

</column>

---

You attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) your prey.
